description: Discover why the world of polygons wants you dead! A cooperative bullet-hell shooter where geometry is power. Battle endless waves of diverse enemies across procedurally generated arenas. Collect game-changing power-ups: freeze enemies, ignite them with fire, gain triple shots, homing bullets, bouncing projectiles, and more! Combine them for devastating synergies! Face off against unique bosses with distinct attack patterns. Solo or with a friend!
